title: Early Melbourne: from village to town
creator_credit: TV Ed Productions, Seven Network Limited (Australia), Lily Steiner and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: Dr Bernard Barrett, State Historian, discusses the early development of Melbourne, covering such topics as the naming of Melbourne, who decided where the streets would be located and what they would be called.
creator_credit_for_label: TV Ed Productions, Seven Network Limited (Australia), Lily Steiner and Jeff Spencer
